plugin-data.name: Lightbox
plugin-data.description: Lightbox en galerij gebaseerd op het lightbox-script van Lokesh Dhakar (http://lokeshdhakar.com/projects/lightbox2/). Lees de instructies op https://github.com/clickwork-git/lightbox.

there-are-no-settings-for-this-plugin: There are no settings for this plugin.
